verses.text: Blessed \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* considereth \w the|strong="H1732"\w* poor: \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will deliver \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* evil.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserve|strong="H4422"\w* \w him|strong="H4422"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w him|strong="H4422"\w* alive, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* blessed \w upon|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H4422"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* support \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* couch \w of|strong="H3068"\w* languishing: \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* makest \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sickness.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w heal|strong="H2015"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

Mine enemies speak evil \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* die, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name perish?

\w And|strong="H4191"\w* if \w he|strong="H8034"\w* come \w to|strong="H4191"\w* see \add me\add*, \w he|strong="H8034"\w* speaketh vanity; \w his|strong="H4191"\w* heart gathereth iniquity \w to|strong="H4191"\w* itself: \w when|strong="H4970"\w* \w he|strong="H8034"\w* goeth abroad, \w he|strong="H8034"\w* telleth \w it|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w All|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7200"\w* whisper \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H2351"\w* devise \w my|strong="H7200"\w* hurt.

\w An|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* disease, \add say they\add*, cleaveth fast \w unto|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H7451"\w* \w now|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* lieth \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.

Yea, mine own familiar friend, \w in|strong="H7901"\w* whom \w I|strong="H1697"\w* trusted, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w did|strong="H3254"\w* eat \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bread, \w hath|strong="H1697"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* heel \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1571"\w* mercy \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* raise \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w that|strong="H3899"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* requite \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou delightest \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* mine enemy \w doth|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* triumph \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* upholdest \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w mine|strong="H3045"\w* integrity, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* settest \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* face \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w*.

Blessed \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*. Amen, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* Amen.
